[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1579706454951{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1652774462619{background-image: url(https://esplanade.hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/topline1.jpg?id=9005) !important;}”]

Your home in Zagreb

[vc_column_text]

Each of our thoughtfully-designed and spacious rooms offers traditional Hollywood glamour in the heart of Croatia’s vibrant capital.

From imaginative interior decoration to the sumptuous marble bathrooms on offer in each of our 208 rooms and suites, each guest is treated as a VIP by our attentive and professional staff.

Stunning view of the city, and complimentary superfast internet, a whole range of room amenities, fully non-smoking rooms and sophisticated interior offer guests a true feeling of home.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column video_bg=”yes” video_bg_url=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bA6gfjHPpRg”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657091196022{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″][vc_empty_space height=”70px”]

Superior Room

[vc_column_text]

Come home to luxury and experience a beautifully-designed, well-equipped Superior Room which offers maximum pampering and impeccable levels of service in the heart of Zagreb.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657090960561{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657090970223{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Deluxe Room

[vc_column_text]

Steps away from the magnificent Art Deco Main Railway Station and other key architectural gems, this room category offers supreme rest and relaxation in the heart of Zagreb.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” anchor=”room”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1511964281165{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

$

$
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657090960561{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657090970223{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Junior Deluxe Suite

[vc_column_text]

Junior Deluxe Suites with goose down duvets, drench shower with its own sitting area and sofa are intelligently-designed for maximum relaxation and productivity.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1657091571485{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1657090970223{padding-top: 0px !important;}”]

Deluxe Suite

[vc_column_text]

Timeless elegance, world-class amenities and close attention to detail combine to deliver an exceptional home-away-from-home.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1661165679061{margin-top: 150px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

 A truly warm and discreet service with a creative touch of charm and humour, tantalizing delicacies crafted by our famous chef and simply irresistible wedding cakes and pastries. Together with the magnificent surroundings which are perfectly characterized by the fairy-tale blend of luxury and elegance, make The Esplanade Hotel the perfect setting for a memorable wedding day to treasure for a lifetime.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1661165700793{border-bottom-width: 50px !important;padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-12 vc_col-md-12″]

Esplanade Suite

[vc_column_text]

With a spacious 120-plus sqm of stylish relaxing, dining and working area together with exquisite views over Fountain Park and the heart of the city, the Presidential Esplanade Suite offers supreme elegance and versatility.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”] MORE [vc_empty_space height=”40px”]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
